name: Something Fishy
description:
***The instruction and credits page are empty. Because we're smart. Credits below, instructions: point, click, buy, feed, wait for them to die.

**This is a VERY rough draft that was mostly about figuring out the shader.

*The bottom corner has a blue corner that can be clicked for full screen mode.

A game about raising sea critters, winning competitions, and selling them to buy more critters.

Also hoping they don't eat each other.

COMPETITION COMING SOON. Or not...we'll see.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming done by Issac Irlas (@iirlas) (He made the fabulous shader for our texture swapping critters) and Nicholas Guerra (@lillium)

Art by Patricia Sipes (@labrattish)

Some credit to Nathan Contreras (@crestedshark)
